attributes.review: My god could it get any worse than this app.? It took three hours to download and then it wanted a donation to their criminal family defense fund. Like I want to go upstairs from my mothers basement and ask my 80 year old mom for money.
attributes.title: Worst app ever!

attributes.review: the volume in this bus is not very astronomical. i am a VERY LOYAL trump supporter! i’m so proud to be an american and wanted this app. HOWEVER, the app took 3 weeks to finish downloading..? and when it finally finished i opened the app just for it to crash! ahh i’m so sad. oh well😍
attributes.title: very much inadequate.

attributes.review: Bro this gave my a permanent virus of Donald trumps face. I had to get a new phone. My screen wouldnt turn on I tried taking it to a phone repare shop but they said there was nothing they could do and wasted 200 dollars to try to remove the virus.
attributes.title: Virus

attributes.review: Possibly the worst app I’ve ever gotten. Actually, take out the possibly. This is most DEFINITELY the worst app I’ve ever downloaded. I can’t believe I waited a whole minute for this to download just for it to be as bad as it is.
attributes.title: What even is this????

attributes.review: That’s Cheeto gave me nightmares I opened the app and the first thing I saw a Cheeto SCARY. At first I thought it was a joke but then realized that was an ACTUAL president HORRIBLE. Anyways don’t recommend also his hair need some watering. And y is he pink????? THE MOST DEFORMED CHETTO PUFF EVER!!! I’ve had Cheetos before and they’ve never looked like this.
attributes.title: ✨🧚‍♀️✨🧚‍♀️🌟❤️

attributes.review: I went on the app and what I saw was horrible. I saw the screen glitch and then my lights started flickering. After that I was sent to outer space which is where I am to this day. 0 out of 10, I do not recommend
attributes.title: I-

attributes.review: Love this app! I can read up on everything Trump and register for all the rallies!!
attributes.title: Best App and Best President Ever!!

attributes.review: i cant BELIEVE what i found out when i saw a government official article saying this app is STEALING and COLLECTING our data? what are they gonna steal next?? my virginity caused by the fact that im a middle aged trump supporter still calling my mom when i need $10 for a big mac 😿😿😿
attributes.title: the caucacity...

attributes.review: I heard that Matthew gray was supposed to show up as a pop up but no instead I got some red guy on my screen than my phone would start too crash honestly excepted better 😔✊
attributes.title: I’m greatly disappointed

attributes.review: If I could give 0 stars, I would. The person behind an app this sh!try should NOT be running a country. Trump uses next generation, best in class AI to steal your information and weaponize it against you!!! Parents: make sure your children don’t fall victim to this SCAM!
attributes.title: SCAM! HOAX! DATA MINING!!!
